casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

97-2723. Johnson v. BP Chemicals, Inc.

Allen App. No. 1-97-32. (Appeal of BP Chemicals, Inc.; cross-appeal of Norman A. Johnson.) The discretionary appeal is allowed.

Douglas, Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent.

The discretionary cross-appeal is allowed.
